name: bobo
question: tell me story about Black Rabbit
answer: Once upon a time, in a lush green forest, there lived a playful black rabbit named Benny. Benny was known far and wide for his swiftness and agility. One day, he stumbled upon a magical, shimmering door. Curious, he hopped through it and found himself in a world of candy! 🍭🍬🍭 There were rivers of chocolate, fields of lollipops, and trees filled with gumdrop fruits. Benny's adventures in Candy Land were filled with laughter, new friends, and of course, lots of sweet treats! The end. 🍭🐇🍭
